desc.en: Xi'an Metro, the urban rail transit system of Xi'an City, Shaanxi Province, China, was established in September 2006 and is a part of the Xi'an urban rail transit system. Its first line (Xi'an Metro Line 2) was opened for trial operation in September 2011, making Xi'an the first city in Northwest China to operate a metro system and the 14th city in Chinese Mainland to do so. Its operation network has extended to the neighboring city of Xianyang. As of December 2024, Xi'an Metro has a total of 11 lines in operation, namely: Line 1, Line 2, Line 3, Line 4, Line 5, Line 6, Line 8 (loop), Line 9, Line 10, Line 14, Line 15, and Line 16, all utilizing the metro system with a total operating mileage of 403 kilometers. Additionally, it operates the Xihu Line, a regional railway line, using a railway system. There are a total of 245 stations (excluding transfer stations), including 37 transfer stations. On December 31, 2024, Xi'an Metro's passenger flow reached a new record high, safely transporting 5.539 million passengers. Xi'an Metro's daily passenger volume exceeded the "5 million mark" for the first time. As Xi'an is the ancient capital of thirteen dynasties in China, it has abundant underground ancient remains, and metro construction often proceeds simultaneously with archaeological excavations. Xi'an Metro has a rigorous process specification for planning, exploration, excavation, and protection, ensuring the safety of cultural relics and the timely opening of the line. References：https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Xi%27an_Metro
desc.zh-Hans:
西安地铁，是中国陕西省西安市的城市轨道交通系统，始建于2006年9月，为西安市城市轨道交通系统的一部分。其第一条线路（西安地铁2号线）于2011年9月开通试运营，使西安市成为中国西北地区首座营运地铁的城市，同时也是中国大陆第14个营运地铁的城市，其运营网已经延伸至了相邻的咸阳市，截至2024年12月，西安地铁开通运营的线路共有11条，分别为：1号线、2号线、3号线、4号线、5号线、6号线、8号（环）线、9号线、10号线、14号线、15号线、16号线，均采用地铁系统，运营里程共计403千米；另运营市域铁路西户线，采用铁路制式；共设车站245座（换乘站不重复计算），其中换乘站37座，2024年12月31日，西安地铁线网客流再创历史新高，平安运送市民乘客553.9万人次，西安地铁单日客运量首次突破“500万大关”
由于西安是中国十三朝古都，地下古代遗存丰富，地铁建设也常与考古发掘工作同步进行。西安地铁对于规划、勘探、发掘、保护的系列环节有一套严谨的流程规范，保证了文物安全与线路如期开通。
参考文献：https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/西安地铁
